short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 使用 AI 魔法總結 Google Meet 會議
short.en: Summarize Google Meet by AI magic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 這款Chrome Extension專為Google Meet使用者設計，讓您輕鬆下載會議的逐字稿，並利用AI技術自動生成簡潔的會議摘要。無論是團隊會議、工作討論還是課程內容，這款擴充功能能夠幫助您有效地管理與記錄會議資訊，省去手動整理的麻煩。透過簡單的操作，即可在會議結束後快速獲取重點摘要，提升工作效率，確保不錯過任何重要細節。
long.en: This Chrome Extension is specifically designed for Google Meet users, allowing you to easily download full meeting transcripts and automatically generate concise summaries using AI technology. Whether it's team meetings, work discussions, or class sessions, this extension helps you efficiently manage and record meeting information, saving you the hassle of manual organization. With simple operations, you can quickly obtain key takeaways after the meeting, enhancing work efficiency and ensuring no important details are missed.
